newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 0.95 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index down 0.95 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index fell 0.64 points, 0.95 percent, to 66.48 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index rose 26.19 points, or 0.87 percent, higher to a provisional 3,029.05.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 8.34 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
